page.title: 03GOVERNMENT IN EPSOM & EWELL
page.content: {The borough}is split into 13 wards and there are 39 councillors who meet as a body every 2 months, but are split to form 5 or 6 departments or committees which meet more regularly. The council is led by the Mayor. {People}are generally happy with the council but on questioning found it hard to identify the mayor let alone any councillors. Roads and street lighting appear to be the major complaints, closely followed by town centre parking. {Many people}thought that the new shopping centre was killing the traditional shops on the High Street. {For the future}a number of people felt that youth clubs and nurseries were most needed.
